success.signedUpSuccessfully: Signed up successfully. Make sure to check your email: you should receive a verification email with a link to click to confirm your email address.
success.bmacCheckForValidationCode: Check the entered email inbox for the validation code
success.avatarUpload: Profile picture updated. Sometimes changes take a while to appear.

claimCode.withoutLogin: Code successfully claimed. Please login to download game.

networkCode.2002-banned: This account has been banned from WalkScape. To appeal this decision, contact support contact@walkscape.app.
networkCode.3010-a: Email has not been verified. Please check your inbox.
networkCode.3011: Invalid credentials. Please make sure you are using the correct email/username and password.
networkCode.3014: Missing properties in the request body
networkCode.3019-a: Invalid username: Leading or trailing spaces are not allowed
networkCode.3019-b: Invalid username: Consecutive spaces are not allowed
networkCode.3019-c: Invalid username: Username must be at least 3 letters long.
networkCode.3019-d: Invalid username: Username must contain at least 3 non-space characters
networkCode.3019-e: Invalid username: Username can only contain letters, numbers and spaces
networkCode.3020: No account exists with given email
networkCode.3021: This email has already been confirmed
networkCode.3024-a: Search string must contain at least 3 non-special characters
networkCode.3025-b: User has claimed special code in the past
